name: healthfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that helps you to produce good health: The website gives advice to dieters for ways to eat more healthfully and lose weight. Living healthfully requires being active and getting regular exercise. Synonym
healthilyRelated word
healthful
More examplesFewer examplesSmart community planning and avoiding sprawl is needed to help cities and towns grow healthfully.To lose weight healthfully, the doctor advised that we eat nutritious foods and avoid crash diets. In an effort to eat healthfully, Laura added more vegetables and whole grains to her diet.
